Highly experienced in various (legal) project organizing and has engaged with professionals in an international and diverse environment. projects.title: "Terhubung" by Sesuka Hatimu Production
projects.description:
Bagus is one of the many IT graduates. He genuinely enjoys his job. Truly a sociable, spirited, youthful soul. Until one day, he met a stranger that was having a hard time starting his website, assuming that that was an easy job, Bagus offered a hand to help, even though he knew that he would sacrifice his resting hours. 
Achievement: 2nd Winner of Sky on Screen Movie Competition by Jakarta in Global 2016

CAST AND CREW:
- Abdul Aziz (Director, Storyline, Cast)
- Adiraka Dwinanda (Music, Cast)
- Ariobimo Prima R. (D.O.P, Editor, Cameraman)
- Farhan Auliya (Co-editor, Storyline)
- Favian M. Rifqi (Editor, Cameraman)
- M. Bagus Hadirejo (Cast)
- M. Rafdi Fayyadh (Property)
- Nabil Azizi (Design)

profile_positions.description: Reporting directly to the Head of International Legal Affairs.
profile_positions.title: Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description:
Within less than a year at TM, I was promoted to this role. In this position, I reported directly to a Senior Legal Manager and a Client Director. I managed the legal and corporate secretarial matters of 40+ client companies (ranging from High-Net-Worth Individuals (HNWI) to NASDAQ-listed companies), including international restructurings and the incorporation of new entities and branches in Europe and abroad. My main responsibilities include:

- Maintained the legal standing of client entities (e.g., B.V., Stichting, Coöperatieve) in accordance with the Anti-Money Laundering Act (WWfT), WTT and Sanction Act.
- Drafted and reviewed the execution of various legal documents, such as Power of Attorneys, Service Agreements, Sales and Purchase Agreements and (board) resolutions/minutes.
- Proactively coordinated the execution of various legal matters, such as share transfer and maintenance, employee share plans, loan agreements and rental agreements with external advisers if needed (notary, tax advisor, and payroll).
- Collaborated with the financial team and prepared the legal documentation for the approval and adoption of financial statements, as well as coordinated assistance from auditors.
- Handled the onboarding of new clients and was responsible for ongoing compliance matters, such as client due diligence (CDD) in the compliance system, to ensure all KYC/AML requirements are met in collaboration with the Compliance department.
- Performed risk analysis on (prospective) clients and formulated sufficient mitigating measures within various compliance taxonomies e.g., AML/CTF, CSR, and Data Privacy (GDPR).
- Conducted transaction monitoring modules, including analysis of incoming and outgoing funds and its legitimacy, integrity checks of payments and resolving unidentified transactions in the compliance system.
- Provided various ad-hoc services, such as arranging D&O liability insurance, IND-related matters, opening bank accounts and (sanction) screenings.
profile_positions.title: Company Lawyer / Legal Account Manager - Corporate Expansion

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I reported directly to the Business Compliance Manager. I advised and collaborated with Account Managers across diverse business lines (Corporate Expansion, Funds, Structured Finance & Capital Markets, and iGaming) on compliance-related matters such as client onboarding and compliance reviews, and transaction monitoring. My main responsibilities included:

- Identified and advised the business lines on specific transactions and obligations, along with associated risks, within specific client profiles.
- Collaborated with the business lines to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements (WWfT / WTT / KYC).
- Conducted extensive UBO(s) investigations of client companies to ensure compliance with internal and external regulatory requirements.
- Implemented and educated the business lines on compliance-related policies, procedures, and programs relevant to their respective areas.
- Analyzed the financial statements of (prospective) client companies by means of clear and comprehensive charts of incoming and outgoing transactions.
- Assessed the (tax) integrity of (prospective) client companies in alignment with Trustmoore's (tax) risk appetite.
- Executed client due diligence/screenings using designated (screening) systems.

Some of my success stories include:

- Successfully onboarded 30+ funds clients within 3 months. This project involved close collaboration with the Funds business line, Compliance department, and the Business Compliance team.
- Provided comprehensive and interactive training sessions to new hires on navigating the (compliance) system. Received positive feedback from new hires and colleagues, who found the training easy to understand.
- Successfully completed the certification course (BOTO 1) with a score of 8.1.
- Timely and successful completion of internal administration, mandatory trainings, and performance reviews.

Tools used: Teams, Outlook, ComplianceWise, LexisNexis, OmniGraffle, DocTract, Zivver, AdobeSign.
profile_positions.title: Business Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
As a Legal & Compliance Officer, I reported directly to the Managing Director and Board of Directors. I also acted as the main contact for the corporate housekeeping with the HQ based in Bali, Indonesia.

Stakeholder management:
- Advised the Board of Directors on complex legal challenges, such as employment, corporate needs, intellectual property, outside-of-court remedies in simple language and solution-oriented advice 
- Liaised and moderated Board meetings with lawyers smoothly and effectively 
- Pulled out a weekly report on the progress of the trademark portfolio to the founder with a brief and comprehensive executive summary
- Developed business frameworks for internal processes in an extensive and detailed manner

Commercial and contracts:
-Drafted contracts in Dutch and English including distributor agreement, transfer of copyright, and release orders.
- Performed in-depth Customer Due Diligence on prospective business partners by verifying administrative documents, developing potential KRIs, and analyzing financial credibility.
- Revamped the terms of service, refund, and privacy policy of the website in accordance with the applicable laws, such as GDPR.
- Overhauled the marketing materials in compliance with the Dutch Advertising Code.
- Researched certification requirements such as V-Label and Leaping Bunny .

Logistics and Supply chain:
- Reclaimed missing packages and retrieved compensation.
- Resolved an issue of import duties due to incorrect documentation within 2 days

Intellectual Property: 
- Convinced the Executive Board with a proposal to register the trademark for 8 classes in the Benelux, EUIPO, and EEA countries
- Registered word- and device-mark at EUIPO with keen attention to details.
- Researched the possible grounds to retrieve trademark registration through case laws and legislations. 

Tools: Slack, Trello, Google Drive, Outlook, Zoom, Hangout, PowerPoint, Excel, Prezi, Webex, Teams, Access.
profile_positions.title: Legal & Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
Elected candidate to represent the interests of students in the decision-making process of the University. In this role, I developed intercultural communication skills by participating in a council that consists of 28 international and diverse students, staff members, and the Executive Board of the University. My passion for achieving affordable and inclusive education at the university has led me to urge the Board to establish a comprehensive and accessible guide for students with studying impairment. I also campaigned for affordable vegetarian and halal meals at the university and urged the Board to include the right to an affordable meal into the Student Charter. 

My success stories include, among others:

- Negotiated the provision of an office/working space for the international students' association.
- Reported a discrimination incident faced by Asian students in the university environment towards the Executive Board. 
- Examined and scrutinized the legality of short-stay contracts in a working group that consists of students, staff members, and an executive board member.
- Advocated for tuition fee compensation for non-EU/EEA students who face study delays resulting from the corona crisis.
- Proposed and influenced the establishment of an emergency fund for international students who were facing financial difficulties due to the COVID-19 pandemic. 
- Formulated an article on the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on international students in a comprehensive and well-represented manner. 
- Summarised and translated a list of corona-aid relief measures for students from the Dutch Student National Representative (ISO) into comprehensive English.
profile_positions.title: University Council member for Lijst Calimero

company.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia

profile_positions.company: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia
profile_positions.description:
Collaborated in a team of 10 diplomats with formulating reports, press briefings, speeches for the Minister, and other documents on confidential matters presented in the directorate within deadlines. The Minister for Foreign Affairs enunciated my draft speech during the ASEAN Ministerial Meeting in Bangkok. 

- Formulated speech materials for the Indonesian President for the ASEAN Commemorative Summits in a comprehensive and well-structured manner. 
- Advised the Indonesian government on the standard salary to hire a professor according to the UN standard.
- Advised the Indonesian Government on the possibility for New Zealand to hold an annual commemorative summit in conjunction with the ASEAN regular summit in an understandable manner. 
- Reviewed the draft of the Ministerial Decree on the Legal Aid within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs through critical analysis.
profile_positions.title: ASEAN External Affairs

company.name: University of Groningen, Faculty of Law

profile_positions.company: University of Groningen, Faculty of Law
profile_positions.description:
Collaborated in research to examine trends in amendment/modification/revision practices in international law. 

- Designed a 1,700-row data spreadsheet to analyze the amendment procedure(s) of multilateral treaties from 1955 until 1970 in the UNTS database with speed and accuracy. 
- Spearheaded logistical matters with a team of 10 students at a law conference (100+ attendees) which was attended by an ICC judge and prominent scholars in international law.
profile_positions.title: Legal Assistant

profile_positions.description: Managed legal projects such as public speaking and pleading, legal debate, a conference on the right to education for students with disabilities, diplomats’ day, and social activities. Lead a team of 5 international and diverse individuals, successfully executed 6 academic projects, and restructured the tutoring program which contributed up to 70% of the association’s revenue.

volunteer_experiences.description: Provided long-term strategic advice and supervision to the management of the executive board member of PPI-Groningen, particularly to Art-Cultural and Communication & Information departments.

Managed the financial budget of the association and negotiated with Dutch and Indonesian companies to maintain a beneficial partnership during the association’s projects. Acquired sponsorships worth up to €4500 from universities, an Indonesian bank and Dutch vendors.
Volunteering in an introduction programme with the goal of creating a welcoming atmosphere for incoming foreign students.
Volunteering with locals to distribute free goods and healthcare in low-income districts in Jakarta
